pullRequest.title: Changing dependency from python3-distutils to python3-distutils-extra
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Changing dependency from python3-distutils to python3-distutils-extra to continue supporting Ubuntu 16.04
Types of changes


 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
 New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
 Enhancement (improves an existing feature and functionality)
 Cleanup (Code refactoring and cleanup, that may add test cases)

commit.message: Changing dependency from python3-distutils to python3-distutils-extra

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Depends: ${misc:Depends}, ${python3:Depends}, genisoimage, nfs-common, python3-pip, python3-distutils-extra, python3-netaddr
          
          
            
            Depends: ${misc:Depends}, ${python3:Depends}, genisoimage, nfs-common, python3-pip, python3-distutils | python3-distutils-extra, python3-netaddr
          
      
    
    
  

@davidjumani will this affect other Ubuntu releases? Saw this other PR, not sure if adding pipe will work here
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -9,7 +9,7 @@ Homepage: http://www.cloudstack.org/
 
 Package: cloudstack-common
 Architecture: all
-Depends: ${misc:Depends}, ${python3:Depends}, genisoimage, nfs-common, python3-pip, python3-distutils, python3-netaddr
+Depends: ${misc:Depends}, ${python3:Depends}, genisoimage, nfs-common, python3-pip, python3-distutils-extra, python3-netaddr
